plugin.name: AI Translate
settings.title: AI Translate
editView.unavailableNoI18n: This Content Type does not have i18n enabled. AI Translate is unavailable.
editView.modal.title: AI Translate
editView.modal.description: It will read the content from the source locale version, translate it, then fill it back into the current form (it will not save automatically).
editView.disabled.documentId: Please save the entry first (requires documentId).
editView.error.translateImpossible: Cannot translate: please save the entry and make sure the target locale is detected.
editView.sourceLocale.label: Source locale
editView.overwrite.label: Overwrite existing fields (default: only fill empty fields)
editView.includeJson.label: Include JSON fields (may translate config/code; use with caution)
editView.prompt.label: Custom instructions (optional)
editView.prompt.placeholder: e.g. Use a formal tone; keep technical terms in English; preserve Markdownâ€¦
settings.subtitle: Configure translation provider, credentials, model, and endpoint.
settings.securityNotice: Note: Saving secrets to the database reduces security. In production, environment variables are recommended. For safety, the server will not return the key/token contents, only whether it is configured and its length.
settings.envOverride.title: Environment variables override
settings.envOverride.provider: Detected environment variable {name}. Provider saved in Settings page will be ignored.
settings.envOverride.openai.apiKey: Detected environment variable {name}. OpenAI API Key saved in Settings page will be ignored.
settings.envOverride.openai.apiUrl: Detected environment variable {name}. OpenAI API endpoint saved in Settings page will be ignored.
settings.envOverride.openai.model: Detected environment variable {name}. OpenAI model saved in Settings page will be ignored.
settings.envOverride.replicate.apiToken: Detected environment variable {name}. Replicate API Token saved in Settings page will be ignored.
settings.envOverride.replicate.model: Detected environment variable {name}. Replicate model saved in Settings page will be ignored.
settings.provider.label: AI provider
settings.provider.hint: OpenAI-compatible uses `POST /v1/chat/completions`; Replicate uses the official SDK to run models.
settings.openai.apiUrl.label: API endpoint (baseURL)
settings.openai.apiUrl.hint: Leave blank to use the SDK default. If you use a proxy/forwarding service, enter its OpenAI-compatible baseURL.
settings.openai.model.label: Model name
settings.openai.model.hint: Leave blank to use the default model (gpt-4o-mini).
settings.openai.apiKey.label: API Key
settings.openai.apiKey.hint: Leave blank to keep the existing value. To change it, enter a new key. You can also click "Clear OpenAI API Key" below.
settings.replicate.model.label: Model (model id)
settings.replicate.model.hint: Enter Replicate model identifier (owner/name or owner/name:version).
settings.replicate.apiToken.label: API Token
settings.replicate.apiToken.hint: Leave blank to keep the existing value. To change it, enter a new token. You can also click "Clear Replicate API Token" below.
settings.support.descriptionPrefix: If this plugin helps you, consider buying me a coffee:
settings.support.qrAlt: Buy Me a Coffee QR code
